# [Interview #1169: White Sand release party, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1169#9)

#### Question

Siri mentions that Bluefinger's ability to keep track of time seems almost supernatural- is it supernatural?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No. Good Question.
